option_a: Consolidated Fund is divided into two Divisions, namely, 'Revenue' and 'Capital' divisions.
option_b: The Revenue Division comprises two sections namely Receipt Heads (Revenue Account) dealing with the proceeds of taxation and other receipts classified as revenue and the section 'Expenditure Heads (Revenue Account)' dealing with the revenue expenditure met therefrom.
option_c: The Capital Division comprises two sections, viz., 'Receipt Heads (Capital Account)' and 'Expenditure Heads (Capital Account)'
